body:
### What to do next

Use this form to tell the court whether or not you support this application.

You should complete this form within 14 days from the day you were told about the application.

It usually takes about 5 minutes.

Youâ€™ll need:

* the name and date of birth of the person the application is about
* your name and contact details
* your solicitors contact details if you have one
heading: Respond to a property and financial affairs application
lede: A person you know is applying to the Court of Protection to make property and financial decisions on someone's behalf - to be their deputy.
